extends java.lang.Thread

      • setShutStages

        protected void setShutStages(int keep,
                 int stop)
        final stages to keep processing 1st - Continue waiting for work. Keep looking for work while not in this stage of shutdown. 2nd - Force stage of shut down. Keep the thread alive while not greater than this stage of shutdown.
        Parameters:
        keep -
        stop -

      • waitWithoutTimeout

        private void waitWithoutTimeout()
        Wait for a post, no timeout. The status coming in is 'detached'. The status going out is 'posted'.

      • waitWithTimeout

        private void waitWithTimeout()
        Wait for a post, with timeout
